Abstract base repository class providing common CRUD operations for JPA entities.

AdminAuthorizationFilter
JAX-RS filter that restricts access to admin users only.
AdminOnly
Annotation to indicate that a resource or method requires admin privileges.
AdminSelfOrManager
Annotation to indicate that a resource or method requires the user to be an admin, the resource owner (self), or a manager.
AdminSelfOrManagerFilter
JAX-RS filter that allows access only to the user themselves or an admin.
AllowAnonymous
Annotation to indicate that a resource or method allows anonymous (unauthenticated) access.
AnotherAuthorizationFilter
JAX-RS filter that denies access if the authenticated user attempts to access their own resource.
AnotherOnly
Annotation to indicate that a resource or method requires the user to be either the resource owner (self) or an admin.
